mapper.select: select phonSeq, phonNumber, phonList, phonMain from contactphone where 1=1 order by phonSeq
select phonSeq, phonNumber, phonList, phonMain, contactAdd_contSeq from contactphone where 1=1 and phonSeq = #{phonSeq} order by phonSeq
mapper.insert:
insert into contactphone( phonNumber, phonList, contactAdd_contSeq, phonMain ) values ( #{phonNumber}, #{phonList}, #{contactAdd_contSeq}, #{phonMain} )
SELECT last_insert_id()
mapper.update: update contactphone set phonNumber = #{phonNumber}, phonList = #{phonList}, contactAdd_contSeq = #{contactAdd_contSeq}, phonMain = #{phonMain} where phonSeq = #{phonSeq}
